facts.fact: Payload support has been added to PSKT (Partially Signed Kaspa Transactions) in the rusty-kaspa repository.
facts.context: This enhancement extends the functionality of PSKT for the Kaspa ecosystem, enabling handling of payloads which can improve transaction workflows and compatibility with advanced transaction features. The feature addresses issue #700 on the repository, indicating an alignment with tracked development needs.
